sentences.en: By the end of May he began to ramble.
sentences.cn: 到了五月底,他就开始有点东拉西扯.

sentences.en: Cathy and I escaped from the washhouse to have a ramble at liberty.
sentences.cn: 凯帝和我从洗衣房溜出来想自由自在地溜达溜达.

sentences.en: Collision detection is a key technique in virtual ramble.
sentences.cn: 碰撞检测是虚拟漫游中的关键技术.

sentences.en: Do not ramble or your interviewer could lose interest.
sentences.cn: 不要闲聊,不然你的面试官会失去兴趣.

sentences.en: Dragon Pine, growth in the ramble palace top rock on mystical valley.
sentences.cn: 虬龙松, 生长在神秘谷逍遥宫顶端的巨岩上.

sentences.en: He had lost track of what he was saying and began to ramble.
sentences.cn: 他忘了自己的话题,便开始瞎扯起来。

sentences.en: I could say much more, but I don't want to ramble on.
sentences.cn: 还有许多话想说, 不罗嗦了.我的思想将一路上跟随着你们.

sentences.en: I like to ramble about the street after work.
I quite like the idea of going for a ramble one weekend.
sentences.cn: 我觉得找个周末去乡下走走这个主意不错。

sentences.en: I won't ramble on about that.
sentences.cn: 对于这个我不会信口开河.

sentences.en: I wonder you should select the thick of a snowstorm to ramble about in.
sentences.cn: 我奇怪你为什么要挑这么个大雪天出来逛荡.

sentences.en: It would have been best written in a more concise way as it does tend to ramble.
sentences.cn: 它的行文确实有些信马由缰，要是简洁一些就好了。

sentences.en: The clouds ramble in the sky everyday, shed tears ever and again.
sentences.cn: 云彩每天都在天空中游走, 有时落泪.

sentences.en: The young man ramble on with an air of great consequence.
sentences.cn: 小伙子带著妄自尊大的神态没完没了地东拉西扯.

sentences.en: There’s plenty to discover as you ramble around this little island.
sentences.cn: 漫步这个小岛，你会有很多新发现。

sentences.en: This is the best season for a ramble in the suburbs.
sentences.cn: 这是去郊区漫游的最好季节.

sentences.en: We are alone together, and may ramble where we like.
sentences.cn: 现在就只有我们两个人在一起, 愿意逍遥到哪儿就到哪儿.

sentences.en: We often go for a ramble in the park after supper.
sentences.cn: 晚饭后我们常常在公园里漫步.

words.tran_cn: 漫步者，漫谈者；攀缘蔷薇

trans.tran_en: a walk in the countryside for pleasure
to go on a walk in the countryside for pleasure
to go on a walk in the countryside for pleasure
